headline: Carrier Board of Directors Declares Quarterly Cash Dividend
summary: Carrier Global Corporation (NYSE:CARR), global leader in intelligent climate and energy solutions, announced today that its Board of Directors declared a quarterly dividend of $0.225 per outstanding share of Carrier common stock. The dividend will be payable on May 22, 2025 to shareowners of record at the close of business on May 2, 2025.

headline: Carrier Global (NYSE:CARR) Tackles Pharma Challenges With New Lynx FacTOR SaaS
summary: Carrier Global (NYSE:CARR) introduced Carrier Lynx FacTOR, a cutting-edge SaaS solution targeting the pharmaceutical sector, aimed at improving product release processes. Despite this innovative product launch, the company's share price declined 13% over the last week, aligning closely with a broader 12% market downturn amid global trade tensions and newly imposed tariffs. Although the launch of Lynx FacTOR is a significant development, the market's overall volatility and the escalating trade...
